sections.MISSION: Comanche Troop, 1st Squadron, 2CR conducts HE FAM FIRE for the M320 at RG105 on 27AUG24 in support of Q4 range density IOT increase the lethality of the REGT and certify soldiers on their weapon system in preparation for live fire exercises
sections.PURPOSE: Increase the lethality of the REGT and certify soldier on their weapon systems in preparation for live fire exercises
sections.KEY TASKS: in this phase will be proper police call of the range, ammo turn in, and accountability of all personnel and equipment.
sections.EXECUTION: and range safety rehearsals. Phase 3: Will begin once all soldiers have completed the qualification and end when the range has been cleared IAW GTA Range Standards.

Task to Subordinate Units

1 C: Provide OIC, RSO, Ammo NCOIC, safeties, and casevac
COMANCHE 320 HE FAM FIRE
